alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 02 at 3:33PM EST until December 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 10 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, Interior DownEast, North Woods, and Penobscot Valley Maine * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult with snowfall becoming heavy at times. Most snowfall will occur late Sunday night into Monday morning, which could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. There is potential for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and caution is advised if driving. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
